lead_paragraph: Attacking midfielder Hatem Ben Arfa has joined Paris St Germain from Nice on a two-year contract, becoming the French champions' first major signing under new coach Unai Emery, the club said in a statement on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Ben Arfa Joins French Champions PSG
headline.main: Ben Arfa Joins French Champions PSG
